item.title: Intermission
item.author: mail@azriel.im (Azriel Hoh)
item.description: Response to the call for Rust 2019 Roadmap blog posts Things I would like prioritized in the 2019 roadmap. Reduced Compilation Times Refined Tools Reduced Compilation Times This is echoed in many existing 2019 blog posts, so instead of detailing the pain, here is a list of the relief / joy this would bring:
